name: .XHB
summary: Learn about .XHB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an XHB file with Maxime DOYEN HomeBank (multiplatform). Select File → Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your XHB file.
If you do not have access to HomeBank, you can open your XHB file in Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor to view the XML data it contains.
You can use Maxime DOYEN HomeBank to convert an XHB file to the .QIF (Quicken Interchange) format. To do so:
Name and save your QIF file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .xhb file in Maxime DOYEN HomeBank
images.caption: XHB file open in Maxime DOYEN HomeBank
